product_summary: AirCaption is an AI-powered speech-to-text transcription tool that allows users to easily generate, review, edit, and export captions for audio and video files. It offers offline functionality, support for up to 60 languages, and various export formats. AirCaption is suitable for a range of users, including video editors, podcasters, language learners, legal professionals, marketers, researchers, event organizers, and online course creators.
product_pros: Easy editing of text and timing

product_usecases.details: AirCaption can be used to transcribe raw footage, making it easier to search and subtitle final videos.
Podcasters can transcribe episodes for blog posts or audience captions.
Subtitles generated by AirCaption can help language learners understand spoken content more easily.
AirCaption can transcribe depositions, court hearings, and other legal proceedings.
Captioned promotional videos can increase engagement, reach a wider audience, and improve SEO.
